scene_description_enriched: A bust of a bishop, identified by his mitre and crozier, is depicted within an illuminated frame. He wears a white alb, a green chasuble, and a richly decorated cope. His right hand is raised in a gesture of blessing, with two fingers extended. The background is a grey, brick-like texture. The surrounding frame is composed of a red and gold floral motif on a blue ground.
